S06n582:1: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt-caranneva tāvadayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānabhibhavati,
S06n582:2: kaḥ punarvādo yadā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati |
S06n582:7: spṛhaṇīyāste sattvā ye sattvasārā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante ||
S06n582:8: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya puṣpāṇāmañjaliṃ kṛtvā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhyavākirat,
S06n582:9: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata-yairbodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam-anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmahe,
S06n582:10: abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān mahatā saṃsārārṇavenohyamānān same pārime tīre pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
S06n582:17: yatte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākaruṇayā samanvāgatā vivarteran anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti |
S06n582:18: na me bhagavan ekacittotpādo'pyutpadyate yatte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06n582:20: iti yadbhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ janayiṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ |
S06n582:22: tayā mahākaruṇayā arthakāmā hitakāmā hi te sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānukampakāḥ,
S06n582:23: ye imairevaṃrūpaiścittotpādaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kimiti vayaṃ tīrṇāḥ sattvāṃstārayema,
S06n582:28: yasteṣāṃ bhagavan prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cittotpādānanumodate,
S06n582:31: kiyatsa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
S06n582:32: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sumeroḥ parvatarājasya palāgreṇa tulyamānasya pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06n582:33: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum |
S06n582:34: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06n582:35: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum |
S06n582:36: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06n582:37: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum |
S06n582:38: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06n582:39: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum |
S06n582:40: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06n582:41: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum ||
S06n582:42: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-mārādhiṣṭhitāste bhagavan sattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06n582:43: ye bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāmevamaprameyamanumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyamiti na śṛṇvanti,
S06n582:52: mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi tairbhagavan ime cittotpādā abhinirhṛtāḥ,
S06n582:66: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittopādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
S06n582:71: yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
S06n582:81: na ca te amanaāpāni rūpāṇi drakṣyanti |
S06n582:82: na ca te amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti |
S06n582:83: na ca te amanaāpān rasān paribhokṣyante |
S06n582:84: na ca te amanaāpāni spraṣṭavyāni sprakṣyanti |
S06n582:88: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā sarvasattvasukhāvahānyaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni yairapi bhagavaṃśchandamutpādya bodhaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ,
S06n582:89: teṣāṃ te cittotpādā vivardhamānā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakā bhaviṣyanti |
S06n582:94: yena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ,
S06n582:95: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ tāṃścittotpādānanumodya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni bhavanti,
S06n582:97: subhūtirāha-kathaṃ ca bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06n582:98: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyopamaṃ cittam ?
S06n582:100: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyām?
S06n582:102: nāhaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ nāpi māyāṃ samanupaśyāmi |
S06n582:103: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yanna māyāṃ nāpi māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi,
S06n582:104: tatkiṃ tvamanyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06n582:106: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06n582:108: so'haṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmasamanuśyan katamaṃ dharmamupadekṣyāmi astīti vā nāstīti vā?
S06n582:110: na so'stīti vā nāstīti vā upaiti |
S06n582:114: na hi bhagavan asaṃvidyamāno dharmo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate |
S06n582:119: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'tyantaviviktāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06n582:123: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan viviktena viviktamabhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati?
S06n582:132: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06n582:138: tathā gambhīre bhagavan arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ |
S06n582:143: taṃ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā ||
S06n582:147: tathā hi bhagavan sa eva dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt,
S06n582:150: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06n582:157: āsannā me'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti sacedevamati na samanupaśyati,
S06n582:159: dūrīkṛtā me śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmirveti sacedasyaivamapi na bhavati,
S06n582:161: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya naivaṃ bhavati-kasyacidahamāsannaḥ,
S06n582:165: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati-anuttarāṃ samyaksabodhirmamāsannā,
S06n582:169: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati-māyākāro mamāsannaḥ,
S06n582:170: yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūra iti |
S06n582:173: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati-anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
S06n582:177: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati-yenārambaṇena pratibhāsa utpadyate tanmamāsanne,
S06n582:178: ye tu khalu punaratra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūra iti |
S06n582:181: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati-anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
S06n582:185: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatasya kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā na saṃvidyate,
S06n582:188: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate |
S06n582:193: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena yo nirmitako nirmitaḥ,
S06n582:194: na tasyaivaṃ bhavati-śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiśca mama dūre,
S06n582:198: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati-śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiśca mama dūre,
S06n582:202: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ,
S06n582:207: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06n582:212: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā dārumayī strī vā puruṣo vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛto bhavet |
S06n582:218: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
